ARGUMENT
a b

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lmhmlem.k | |- K = ( Scalar ` S ) |
| 2 |  | lmhmlem.l | |- L = ( Scalar ` T ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` S ) = ( .s ` S ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` T ) = ( .s ` T ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_islmhm | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) <-> ( ( S e. LMod /\ T e. LMod ) /\ ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ L = K /\ A. a e. ( Base ` K ) A. b e. ( Base ` S ) ( F ` ( a ( .s ` S ) b ) ) = ( a ( .s ` T ) ( F ` b ) ) ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_3simpa | |- ( ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ L = K /\ A. a e. ( Base ` K ) A. b e. ( Base ` S ) ( F ` ( a ( .s ` S ) b ) ) = ( a ( .s ` T ) ( F ` b ) ) ) -> ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ L = K ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_anim2i | |- ( ( ( S e. LMod /\ T e. LMod ) /\ ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ L = K /\ A. a e. ( Base ` K ) A. b e. ( Base ` S ) ( F ` ( a ( .s ` S ) b ) ) = ( a ( .s ` T ) ( F ` b ) ) ) ) -> ( ( S e. LMod /\ T e. LMod ) /\ ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ L = K ) ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_sylbi | |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) -> ( ( S e. LMod /\ T e. LMod ) /\ ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ L = K ) ) ) |
